quote_last: ."Hello," I said. "Hello," came a woman's voice. "Sorry about the time before. There's a disturbance in the sound field. Sometimes the sound goes away." "The sound goes away?" "Yes," she said. "The sound field's slipping. Can you hear me?" "Loud and clear," I said. It was the granddaughter of that kooky old scientist who'd given me the unicorn skull. The girl in the pink suit.
title: Hard Boiled Wonderland and the End of the World
author: Haruki Murakami
